Summary Note:
The RM is a close family friend of Andersen Mikkelsen Nielsen's parents, having known him since birth. This deep-rooted connection has facilitated a strong and trustworthy professional relationship.
Andersen Mikkelsen Nielsen is a 37 year old and comes from Denmark.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Andersen Mikkelsen Nielsen is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
In 2007, Andersen graduated from Middelfart Gymnasium with a secondary school diploma.
Andersen finished his studies at Copenhagen Business School in 2010.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 13 years, Andersen Mikkelsen Nielsen has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Andersen Mikkelsen Nielsen's first role was as a Property Manager at Carlsberg Byen A/S, where he worked diligently from 2012 to 2014 to establish a strong reputation.
His subsequent role was as a Developer at Jeudan A/S, where he continued to grow professionally from 2016 till now.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 660000 DKK, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has townhouse located in Odense, worth 1377000 DKK.

He purchased flat in Kolding, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 1258000 DKK.
On top of that he inherited a beautiful townhouse in Greve, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 1290000 DKK.

In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 42780000 DKK from his late grandmother, a renowned Hedge Fund Manager, in 2018.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
